channel.title: Adventure on Suburban Nerd
channel.description: Recent content in Adventure on Suburban Nerd

item.title: Monkey Island I remade as a Flash Movie
item.description: Forgot some of the plot details of this classic adventure game? Get a quick and humorous reminder with this awesome flash movie. I just realized my two most memorable childhood games involve pirates and ninjas. Guess you can't go wrong with ninjas and pirates.
